sqlMap.select: SELECT U.*, U1.USER_NAME AS OPERATE_NAME, U2.USER_NAME AS REGISTE_OPERATE_NAME, A1.APP_NAME AS REGISTE_APP_NAME, A2.APP_NAME AS OPERATE_APP_NAME FROM T_A_USER U LEFT JOIN T_A_USER U1 ON U.OPERATOR = U1.ID LEFT JOIN T_A_USER U2 ON U.REGISTER_OPERATOR = U2.ID LEFT JOIN T_A_APPLICATION A1 ON U.REGISTER_APP_ID = A1.ID LEFT JOIN T_A_APPLICATION A2 ON U.OPERATE_APP_ID = A2.ID WHERE U.ID=#value#
